participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Jessica is focused on her goals and strives for excellence in everything she does.
participant_1.background: i won homecoming queen this year. my current goal is to run a k. i am currently in high school. i make straight as in school. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and friendly, Michael enjoys spending time with friends and believes in having fun while balancing responsibilities.
participant_2.background: i work took i have a part time job at burger king. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. they're constantly on my back. i just want to have fun with my friends.

content.text: I am doing well. How are you?
